# Books

## [Individual Psychometrics: <small>An Assessment Toolkit With Applications in R</small>](https://individual-psychometrics.rbind.io/)

[A free online book about psychometric tools for psychological assessment]{.lead}

I have been working on a book project off and on since 2012. I have ambitious goals for this book, but it is not nearly complete. The preliminary, unfinished version is [here](https://individual-psychometrics.rbind.io/).
